stories.title: Trump's global tariff takes effect at 10%, not 15% as announcedPublished6 minutes agoConfusion over the tariff rate underscores the uncertainty businesses face as the administration scrambles to rebuild its trade regime after the Supreme Court struck down IEEPA-based duties.75 sources

Venezuela frees nearly 2,200 under new amnesty law43 sources

2026 is deadliest start to a year for Mediterranean migrants, UN saysPublished7 hours agoAt least 606 migrants have died or gone missing crossing the Mediterranean since January, the IOM said, as rescuers search for 30 people off Crete.34 sources

Maryland sues to block ICE detention center near Williamsport34 sources

Trump dismisses Pentagon warnings about Iran strike risksPublished8 hours agoThe president called reports of his top general's caution "100% incorrect," saying any conflict would be "easily won."39 sources

Johnson says Congress unlikely to codify Trump's tariffs after court ruling73 sources

Hypothetical AI crisis report sparks broad stock selloffPublished14 hours agoDoorDash, American Express, and software stocks slumped Monday after Citrini Research published a dystopian scenario imagining AI-driven economic collapse by 2028.65 sources

France bars US envoy Kushner from government accessPublished10 hours agoAmbassador Charles Kushner skipped a summons over Trump administration remarks about a slain far-right activist, prompting an unprecedented diplomatic rebuke.42 sources

Epstein hid computers, photos in secret storage units across the US, report finds44 sources
Supreme Court to hear oil firms' bid to block climate lawsuits45 sources

Judge permanently blocks Jack Smith classified docs reportPublished16 hours agoThe ruling by Trump-appointed Judge Aileen Cannon came one day before restrictions on the report were set to automatically expire.79 sources

Rival studies clash over fate of massive dying star WOH G64Published2 hours agoA Nature Astronomy paper published Feb. 23 says the star transformed into a yellow hypergiant, but a competing team says it never changed.53 sources

Apple to begin manufacturing Mac Mini in HoustonPublished4 hours agoThe move makes the compact desktop Apple's second consumer product assembled in the U.S., alongside the Mac Pro built in Austin since 2013.97 sources

Anthropic launches up to $6B employee share salePublished6 hours agoThe AI company is letting current and former staffers sell shares at a roughly $350 billion valuation, days after closing a $30 billion funding round.54 sources

Tesla sues California DMV to reverse false advertising ruling on self-driving claimsPublished7 hours agoDays after complying with corrective measures, the automaker filed suit to erase the finding that its Autopilot and FSD marketing misled consumers.42 sources

Newborn hepatitis B vaccination fell sharply before CDC policy change, study finds43 sources

Amazon to invest $12B in Louisiana data centersPublished11 hours agoThe tech giant's first data center campuses in the state will span two parishes and create more than 2,000 direct and indirect jobs.28 sources

Court filing reveals Meta survey on teens' exposure to sexual content on Instagram38 sources

Scientists discover horses whistle and sing at oncePublished14 hours agoA new study in Current Biology found that horses produce their signature whinny by whistling through the larynx while vibrating vocal folds.53 sources

European car sales slip in January as EVs gain groundPublished1 hour agoBattery-electric registrations grew nearly 14% even as overall new car sales across Europe dropped, according to industry data released Tuesday.90 sources

Lukoil's $22B asset sale faces Feb. 28 sanctions deadline61 sources

Oil dips as US, Iran prepare for third nuclear talks roundPublished4 hours agoCrude prices pulled back from near seven-month highs as Tehran signaled willingness to make nuclear concessions ahead of Thursday's Geneva meeting.69 sources

Silver surges past $87 as tariff chaos and geopolitical fears fuel safe-haven rushPublished4 hours agoThe metal jumped roughly 6% on Monday, tripling gold's gains, as Trump's new tariffs and U.S.-Iran tensions rattled markets.71 sources
